caption:
Bitcoin is “only” $97,000.

Sounds crazy to say that, right?
But what if I told you this isn’t the end—
It’s still the beginning.

BlackRock’s Larry Fink…
JP Morgan analysts…
Even the skeptics are starting to whisper the same number:
$1,000,000 Bitcoin.

You’ve got 5 to 10 years.
That might feel like forever—
But blink… and it’s gone.
Your kids will be teenagers.
Your job might not even exist.
And this moment—the one you’re living through right now—
will either be the reason you’re free… or the regret you carry.

Everyone wishes they bought more.
Everyone has an excuse not to.

But the truth?
You don’t need more time. You need a decision.

If you want help building your portfolio,
acquiring smart,
and keeping your Bitcoin safe for the long run—
drop me a DM.

Let’s do this right.
Before it’s too late.
